text:
Marion Hänsel (12 February 1949 – 8 June 2020) was a French-born Belgian movie director, producer, actress and screenwriter. Her best known movie was "Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea". It was entered into the 1995 Cannes Film Festival.
Hänsel died on 8 June 2020, aged 71.

annotations.surface_form: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea
